content: imawale s gear stick sock yarn about 20-30 meters from a fingering wool for instance regia 4 ply needles a 2 0 circular needle stich pattern round 1 p1 k1 yo k1 repeat from to round 2 and 3 p1 k3 round 4 p1 k1 ssk cast on 30 sts ribbing round p1 k2 around work ribbing as set for 10 rounds work stich pattern repeating the 4 rounds 7 times next round k2tog yo k1 repeat from to so there are no purl stiches left next 2 rounds k next round k1 ssk repeat till end of the round next round k2tog till end of the round next round k2tog so there are 5 stiches left finished with a heart of a blossom enjoy
